name: 2023 12th International Conference on Computing and Pattern Recognition
content: Publication&Indexing: 1\. ICCPR 2023 Conference Proceedings by ACM(ISBN: 979-8-4007-0798-8) : archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, reviewed by CPCI. 2\. International Journal of Machine Learning (IJML) (E-ISSN: 2972-368X), which will be indexed by Inspec (IET), Google Scholar, Crossref, ProQuest, Electronic Journals Library, CNKI.
